item.description:
Have you ever taken one of our past bootcamp classes with Alex?  If not, you missed out!  Her classes are actually fun and something you start to look forward to. 

Well Alex is opening a new fitness studio!!  (YAY!!)

Come check out the Studio on Wednesday, August 31st from 7:00pm to 9:00pm at 1285 Washington Street, East Weymouth located in Patriot Building. Parking available both in the front and rear of the building.  Healthy smoothies & snacks will be served.

This event will NOT have a group organizer but is a great way for members to check out this new studio, meet Alex and see what this studio has to offer. 

Here is a link to the AMA Personal Training for more info on what Alex offers.   http://www.amapersonaltraining.net/News---Updates-.html

ALSO... check them out on Facebook for some additional info and "LIKE" her page!  :) 

*** Please RSVP if you do plan on attending so I can give Alex a heads up on how many to expect from our group.  THANK YOU!****

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: AMA Personal Training... OPEN HOUSE
